file.name: openapi-v3.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: "1.0.0"
  title: "To Do List API"
x-controller: todo
paths:
  /:
    get:
      summary: Get a list of tasks
      x-operation: getList
      responses:
        200:
          description: Get a list of tasks
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaskList'
    post:
      summary: Add a new task
      x-operation: addTask
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Task"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Get the added task
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Task'
  /{task_id}:
    parameters:
      - in: path
        name: task_id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: number
          minimum: 0
    get:
      summary: Get a task by ID
      x-operation: getTask
      responses:
        200:
          description: Get the task
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Task'
        404:
          description: Not found
    put:
      summary: Update a task
      x-operation: updateTask
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Task"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Get the updated task
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Task'
        404:
          description: Not found
    delete:
      summary: Delete a task
      x-operation: deleteItem
      responses:
        204:
          description: Task deleted
components:
  schemas:
    Task:
      type: object
      required:
        - title
        - due
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          minimum: 0
        title:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        due:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        completed:
          type: boolean
          default: false
    TaskList:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Task'
